name: Enterprise Bank & Trust Company
description: Enterprise Bank & Trust Company (EBTC) is a community-focused financial institution that provides a full range of banking services to individuals and businesses. Founded in 1988, EBTC has grown its footprint primarily in the states of Massachusetts and New Hampshire, delivering personalized banking solutions tailored to the needs of its customers. The bank emphasizes a commitment to local communities, engaging in initiatives that support economic development and charitable activities. EBTC offers a variety of services including personal banking accounts, business banking solutions, commercial lending, and wealth management services. With a strong focus on customer service, the bank prides itself on maintaining long-lasting relationships with its clients and understanding their unique financial needs. The institution is also dedicated to leveraging technology to enhance customer experience, offering online banking, mobile banking, and robust digital tools that ensure convenience and security for its users. As a member of the FDIC, EBTC ensures the safety of deposits while striving to deliver competitive rates and services. The bank’s mission centers around building strong partnerships with its clients while contributing positively to the local economy and community wellbeing.

seo.meta_title: Enterprise Bank & Trust Company | Community Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Enterprise Bank & Trust Company, your partner in community banking. Explore our range of personal and business banking products tailored for your financial needs.

faq.question: What services does Enterprise Bank & Trust Company offer?
faq.answer: Enterprise Bank & Trust Company offers personal banking, business banking, commercial lending, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Enterprise Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Enterprise Bank is headquartered in Lowell, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Enterprise Bank?
faq.answer: Jack M. McCarthy is the CEO of Enterprise Bank & Trust Company.
